para.text: This example uses interpolation for several user-defined data sets. Several different interpolation algorithms are available in ModelMuse. In this section, the effects of changing the interpolation algorithm will be explored. To do this, the grid will be colored using the Kx data set and then the interpolation algorithm for several user-defined data sets will be changed to see how that affects the results.
